Articles.Content:
bees are unable to fly

Edited June 7, 2019 by JERONIMO
thx gargamel ;-;
bees can fly because of scaling effects.  Could the mods do us all a favour and delete this whole post?

Giant walls of text like this are not allowed on the forums.  If you'd like to post such things like log files or something pointless about bees, please host it on a service like dropbox and link it here.   Large posts like this cause issue for some users' browsers and makes it unable for them to view the forums. 

Please do not use click baity thread titles.
